column1: You will need to avoid some sports, such as downhill skiing or contact sports like football and soccer.
Keep the dressing (bandage) on your incision clean and dry.
If you do change it, follow these steps: - Wash your hands well with soap and water.
- Soak some clean gauze with saline and wipe from one end of the incision to the other.
- Dry the incision the same way with clean, dry gauze.
- If you are taking blood thinners, ask your doctor whether you can also take ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin) or other anti-inflammatory drugs.
